EmailTemplate.description: Notify the user when he does not login from last 365 days.
EmailTemplate.name: Deletion/Notification Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Business Link ID â€“ Deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This email is your notification that your Business Link ID is deactivated due to lack of activity for over a year.
If you need access to Business Link applications, please register through one of the Business Link portals (links provided below).
Business Link URLs http://www.winfield.com/BusinessLinkLogin/default.aspx http://www.landolakesinc.com/utility/login/default.aspx http://www.purinamills.com/login/ https://www.answertech.com/ http://portal.landolakes.com/
If you have any questions or concerns, please call us toll free at 1-866-270-4706. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.
Sincerely,
Business Link
